text: Local dive bar, cold beer, friendly town people and staff. They have appetizers which smelled amazing but didn't try
Great local bar with affordable food and drink. Staff is top notch and there is a nice ambiance along with daily specials. Would recommend if you're in town!

Great local bar in Tuscola with quick service and friendly staff! Also offers food, slot machines and pool tables. Sometimes they also have live bands on Saturday nights. If you are looking for a slower pace this is it.
